text: Hagi ana kegura tamagra huta, tagra Bali havi anumzamofo amema'arera monora huonte'nonanki, inankna huta tagra'a tazeri pehena hu'none huta nehaze. Hianagi tamagrama kasrino havizama hu'nea avu'ava zama agupofima hu'naza zana keho. Hagi tamagra a' kemoli afu'mofo agifi he'negeno, krahakraha huno ve kemoligu hakeno vano hiankna huta havi anumzankura haketa vano nehaze.
